body_html:
I don't know your script X and what git commands executes but I see the Y effects. E.g. When merged I see:

vrv merged commit 9d5d3d0 into tensorflow:master 6 hours ago

When closed I see:

vrv closed this in 90fb80a 6 hours ago

So seems to me that the second case was closed only by commit message special syntax like "Closing".

body:
I don't know your script X and what git commands executes but I see the Y effects. E.g. When merged I see:

```
vrv merged commit 9d5d3d0 into tensorflow:master 6 hours ago
```

When closed I see:

```
vrv closed this in 90fb80a 6 hours ago
```

So seems to me that the second case was closed only by commit message special syntax like "Closing".
